name: 19th Century Manoir
description:
DESCRIPTION
Because your wedding will be a unique day, this Manoir invites you to organize your reception in a wonderful little green setting in the Somme. These places full of elegance and authenticity will be the ideal place to celebrate your love in complete privacy. The rental of the reception venue includes: the domain, the accommodation (3 lodgings: 11 beds, 8 beds and 5 beds), 1.5 hectares of garden for your reception as well as an outdoor car park.
Take advantage of the accommodation on site for your guests: independent half-timbered house of 280 m², the first gite, with an outdoor terrace of 110 m², is suitable for up to 11 people. The second gîte with its 76m 262m² terrace and a capacity of 8 people maximum and the sheepfold 70m2 lastly can accommodate 5 people is also available.
Quietly located in the countryside, the gîtes and manoir have a reception room for your wedding evening: the Sheepfold and its terrace. With a surface area of 70 m², you can receive up to 45 people for a sit-down meal and 60 for a standing meal. There is also use of a dancefloor for your disposal.
The team will be happy to welcome you to celebrate your big day and propose the privatization of its 4,000 m² of domain. These professionals will accompany you throughout your preparations until D-Day to make you live an unforgettable moment. They will take care of the decoration and the provision of furniture and service equipment. Tents and marquees can also be set up for larger guest numbers.
Take advantage of the know-how of these professionals thanks to their catering service, passionate cooks will be in charge of delighting your guests during your wedding party or any professional or private event. Do not hesitate to contact them to tell them about your project.
The 19th century manoir also opens its doors to discover five warm and comfortable rooms. Your breakfast will be served in the large living room with character, where the antique furniture lives up to the elegance of the architecture. In addition to the guest rooms, you can enjoy the large tree-lined garden.
If you require any further information then please do let us know and one of our team will be more than happy to help.
additional_info:
